DOC.brief_title: Diagnosis Bladder Pain Syndrome / Interstitial Cystitis
DOC.detailed_description: Collection analysis bladder biopsy , bladder washing , blood urine sample patient bladder pain syndrome/interstitial cystitis ( BPS/IC ) , overactive bladder syndrome ( OAB ) bladder-healthy control . Analyses include ELISA , RT-qPCR , DNA sequencing , immunohistochemistry technique . Differences patient group statistically evaluate .
